title: IBoundaryBossFeatureData.AutoSelect
description: Gets or sets whether to automatically select all or only specific bodies for the boundary feature to affect in the multibody part.
returns: True to automatically select all bodies, false to select specific bodies
remarks:
This property is only available when:
IBoundaryBossFeatureData::FeatureScope
property is true.
curves are
faces
or
edges
.
The boundary feature is expanded along the plane on which the feature is created and selects all or only the specified bodies it intersects.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
